channel.title: If anyone understands the concept of
channel.description:
Runescape: world 16 air ccrafters, could soemoen make a script where I am the crafter?
I give 25 noted ess and 2kcash for 25 unoted ess, click the rock to craft it and repeat over and over. it is simple, but has to be accurate or it could give to much money.

item.title: If anyone understands the concept of
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

This is better

him = repeat say open until other person trades
him = trade other
him = Give 25 Noted ess and 2k Gp
other person = Give 25 Unoted ess
him = check to make sure he gave 25 noted ess and 2k gold
him and other person = accept first trade screen
him = check again if he has 25 ess
him and other person = accept 2nd trade screen
him = use “other person” unnoted ess on the alter

Read full topic
item.source: If anyone understands the concept of

item.title: If anyone understands the concept of
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

this is better:

him = say “Open!”
other person = trades you
him = Trade “other person”
him = Give 25 Noted ess and 2k Gp
other person = Give 25 Unoted ess
him = check to make sure he gave 25 noted ess and 2k gold
him and other person = accept first trade screen
him = check again if he has 25 ess
him and other person = accept 2nd trade screen
him = use “other person” unnoted ess on the alter
[optional]him = say “Open!”
[verry optional]him = say “so what you doing tonight?”
[verry verry optional]him = say “want to have cyber sex later?”
him = Waits until “other person” trades for unnoted ess

Read full topic

item.description:
@ciller wrote:

this is a better one :

him = say “Open!”
him = Trade who ever trades him
him = Give 25 Noted ess and 2k Gp
other person = Give 25 Unoted ess
him = check to make sure he gave 25 noted ess and 2k gold
him = check if he has 25 ess
him = accept trade
him = use those ess on the alter
him = say “Open!”

him = Give 25 Noted ess and 2k Gp

item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Texasmd91, post:8, topic:68214”][quote author=dudeofthed link=topic=99825.msg1018656#msg1018656 date=1174044693]

no. I stand in the alter, and if someone trades me I accept i give 2k ess and 25 noted ess and scar checks to see thaat they give 25 noted ess. then I accept if they give the right ess and then click the alter and repeat te rpocess.i will mauelly do the abnking and randoms.

So you want it to trade people 2000 essence then tey give you 25 noted essence for it?
[/quote]

no

him = Trade who ever trades him
him = Give 25 Noted ess and 2k Gp
Other person = Give 25 Unoted ess
Him = use those ess on the alter
[optional]Him = say “Open!”

and repeat[/quote]

Ohhhh.
THAT’S EASY…

I’ll have it ready for you in no time.

Read full topic
